title: Highland winter
creator_credit: Roger Scholes, Nick Housego, Kath Scholes and Wilderness Society
brief_description: An elderly woman living in a nursing home recalls images of the wild and isolated land she is no longer able to visit. The film recalls the winter journeys of her childhood in the Central Highlands of Tasmania. With Emily Talbot Higgins.
creator_credit_for_label: Roger Scholes, Nick Housego, Kath Scholes and Wilderness Society
